25#include <cassert>
26#include <limits>
27#include <cmath>
28
29#include "binary_stream.hpp"
30
31namespace bitpit {
32
39template<>
40bitpit::IBinaryStream& operator>>(bitpit::IBinaryStream &stream, std::string &value)
41{
42 int size = 0;
43 stream.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&size), sizeof(size));
44
45 if (size > 0) {
46 std::vector<char> buffer(size);
47 stream.read(buffer.data(), size);
48 value.assign(buffer.data(), size);
49 }
50
51 return stream;
52}
53
60template<>
61bitpit::OBinaryStream& operator<<(bitpit::OBinaryStream &stream, const std::string &value)
62{
63 int size = value.size();
64 stream.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&size), sizeof(size));
65
66 if (size > 0) {
67 stream.write(value.c_str(), size);
68 }
69
70 return stream;
71}
72
85BinaryStream::BinaryStream()
86 : m_size(0), m_pos(0), m_chunkSize(1)
87{
88}
89
97BinaryStream::BinaryStream(std::size_t size)
98 : m_pos(0)
99{
100 setSize(size);
101}
102
112BinaryStream::BinaryStream(const char *buffer, std::size_t capacity)
113{
114 open(buffer, capacity);
115}
116
125BinaryStream::BinaryStream(const std::vector<char> &buffer)
126{
127 open(buffer.data(), buffer.size());
128}
129
137void BinaryStream::open(const char *buffer, std::size_t size)
138{
139 open(size);
140
141 m_buffer.assign(buffer, buffer + size);
142}
143
149void BinaryStream::open(std::size_t size)
150{
151 m_pos = 0;
152
153 setSize(size);
154}
155
161std::streampos BinaryStream::tellg() const
162{
163 return m_pos;
164}
165
172bool BinaryStream::seekg(std::size_t pos)
173{
174 if (pos >= getSize()) {
175 return false;
176 }
177
178 m_pos = pos;
179
180 return true;
181}
182
188char * BinaryStream::data()
189{
190 return m_buffer.data();
191}
192
198const char * BinaryStream::data() const
199{
200 return m_buffer.data();
201}
202
208bool BinaryStream::eof() const
209{
210 return (m_pos >= getSize());
211}
212
220bool BinaryStream::seekg(std::streamoff offset, std::ios_base::seekdir way)
221{
222 if ((way == std::ios_base::beg) && (offset < (long) getSize())) {
223 m_pos = offset;
224 } else if ((way == std::ios_base::cur) && (m_pos + offset < getSize())) {
225 m_pos += offset;
226 } else if ((way == std::ios_base::end) && ((long) getSize() - offset >= 0)) {
227 m_pos = getSize() - offset;
228 } else {
229 return false;
230 }
231
232 return true;
233}
234
240std::size_t BinaryStream::getSize() const
241{
242 return m_size;
243}
244
250void BinaryStream::setSize(std::size_t size)
251{
252 setCapacity(size);
253
254 m_size = size;
255}
256
269void BinaryStream::setCapacity(std::size_t capacity)
270{
271 m_chunkSize = 1;
272 std::size_t nChunks = capacity;
273 while (nChunks > (std::size_t) std::numeric_limits<int>::max()) {
274 m_chunkSize = 2 * m_chunkSize;
275 nChunks = (1 + ((capacity - 1) / m_chunkSize));
276 }
277
278 m_buffer.resize(nChunks * m_chunkSize);
279}
280
291int BinaryStream::getChunkSize()
292{
293 return m_chunkSize;
294}
295
309int BinaryStream::getChunkCount()
310{
311 return (getCapacity() / m_chunkSize);
312}
313
329std::size_t BinaryStream::getCapacity() const
330{
331 return m_buffer.size();
332}

395void IBinaryStream::open(std::size_t size)
396{
397 BinaryStream::open(size);

407void IBinaryStream::open(const char *buffer, std::size_t size)
408{
409 BinaryStream::open(buffer, size);

411
419void IBinaryStream::read(char *data, std::size_t size)
420{
421 if ((m_pos + size) > getSize()) {
422 throw std::runtime_error("Bad memory access!");
423 }
424
425 std::memcpy(data, m_buffer.data() + m_pos, size);
426 m_pos += size;
427}
428
441OBinaryStream::OBinaryStream()
442 : BinaryStream(), m_expandable(true)
443{
444}
445
455OBinaryStream::OBinaryStream(std::size_t size)
456 : BinaryStream(size), m_expandable(size == 0)
457{
458}
459
469void OBinaryStream::open(std::size_t size)
470{
471 // Set the stream expandable to allow changing its size
472 m_expandable = true;
473
474 // Open a stream with the desidered size
475 BinaryStream::open(size);
476
477 // Set the definitive expandable flag
478 m_expandable = (size == 0);
479}
480
488void OBinaryStream::setSize(std::size_t size)
489{
490 if (!m_expandable) {
491 throw std::runtime_error("Stream is not expandable.");
492 }
493
494 BinaryStream::setSize(size);
495}
496
501void OBinaryStream::squeeze()
502{
503 bool expandableFlag = m_expandable;
504
505 // Set the stream expandable to allow changing its size
506 m_expandable = true;
507
508 // Update the size of the stream
509 setSize(tellg());
510
511 // Set the expandable flag back to its initial value
512 m_expandable = expandableFlag;
513}
514
522void OBinaryStream::write(const char *data, std::size_t size)
523{
524 if (getSize() - m_pos < size) {
525 // If the stream is not expandable, the request for a new size
526 // will throw an exception.
527 std::size_t bufferSize = getSize() + size;
528 setSize(bufferSize);
529 }
530
531 std::memcpy(m_buffer.data() + m_pos, data, size);
532 m_pos += size;
533}
534
535}
